Interface RelativeHardwareKnob

All Superinterfaces:
ContinuousHardwareControl<RelativeHardwareControlBinding>, HardwareBindingSource<RelativeHardwareControlBinding>, HardwareControl, HardwareElement, RelativeHardwareControl
public interface RelativeHardwareKnob extends RelativeHardwareControl
Represents a physical hardware knob that inputs a relative value.
Since:
API version 10
